articles.description: The deal would mark the most expensive sale of a US sports team in history.

articles.description: Lee Carsley says his England Under-21 side were "shell-shocked" during their 2-1 Euros defeat by Germany.
articles.title: Lee Carsley: England U21s 'shell-shocked' during Germany loss, says boss

articles.title: Premier League 2025-26 fixtures: Liverpool host Bournemouth, Manchester United face Arsenal on opening weekend

articles.description: England stick with Ollie Pope at number three rather than recalling Jacob Bethell for the first Test against India, starting on Friday.
articles.title: England vs India: Ollie Pope preferred to Jacob Bethell as Chris Woakes returns for first Test

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says the experience new PGA Tour chief executive Brian Rolapp will bring to the role could be "amazing".
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: New PGA Tour CEO Brian Rolapp could be 'amazing', says five-time major winner

articles.description: Fans are critical after the highest priced tickets at Manchester United rise from £66 to £97 next season.
articles.title: Manchester United ticket price plans 'a kick in teeth', says fans' group
